episode.title: Stencel Aero Engineering Corporation v. United States

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: In 76-321, Stencel against the United States for reasons stated and an opinion filed with the clerk this morning, the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit was affirmed.
Mr. Justice Marshall with whom Mr. Justice Brennan joined filed a dissenting opinion.
